subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : The 4f and 5f - series of elements are placed separately in the Periodic table to preserve the principle of classification. Statement (II) : s-block elements can be found in pure form in nature.

options.text: (1) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(2) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(3) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
